item.title: PHP Stock Photography Ecommerce site
item.description: References Created a php stock photography site with paypal integration Description: A Web site with the ability for client to add, rearrange and sell photos. As well as displaying thumbnails on the site to prevent theft. Tooling: Vim, PHP, HTML, CSS, Javascript, MYSQL, ImageMagick, Bootstrap, PayPal, Trello, Figma, PlantUML, Markdown, Shell Methodology: Agile Design Pattern: Procedural PHP with templating Version control and Deployment: Git, XAMPP, phpMyAdmin Summary

I am in my final year of my BscIT Degree at Eduvos. I have a higher certificate in Software Engineering through the MLM course from CTI/Eduvos I have a strong interest in optimizing all of the ways I interact with my computer. When I’m not working, I enjoy watching movies, reading books, swimming, hiking, learning skills, 3D modelling, pixel art, attempting to make games with Godot, writing blogs and learning languages.
